title: My Husband's Killer Affair
overview: When Michelle Clark hires young Melissa Juneau as her new live-in nanny, she has no idea the grave danger that she has put her family in; not only has Melissa had an affair with her husband, but she is also under the cruel control of Carlton Clark, Michelle's greedy brother-in-law; Carlton has his heart set on Michelle as well as the Clark's family fortune and will stop at nothing to achieve his goals.
